item.title: DIS
item.description: score:-54 Chances: Disney’s CEO Bob Iger admits that Disney is behind Netflix in streaming technology. Disney’s Disney+ has surpassed 150 million subscribers in a short period of time. Blackwells Capital raises governance concerns about ValueAct Capital Management’s management fees from Disney. Risks: Disney is at a disadvantage in streaming technology and has higher marketing expenses.
